reqBody.prompt: 1girl. Medium breasts. Imagine an adult striking a star pose, with legs shoulder-width apart and arms outstretched to the sides. Has brown hair, fox ears, a bushy tail, simple shoes. Show from a front view, a back view, and a side view, gaze fixed on the viewer. Reference sheet, colour chart. The adult defied the clan to protect a sacred grove, and now seeks allies to restore balance to the natural world.
reqBody.negative_prompt: signatures, words, intricate hairstyle, hair accessories, jewelry, intricate patterns, excessive details, flowing scarves, complex accessories, dynamic pose, foreshortening, extreme angles, obscured limbs, child, teenager, high heels, white background, cropped, close-up, face only, bust-up, half-body, torso only, legs only, arms only, asymmetrical, unbalanced, arms in front of body, legs wide apart, exaggerated pose, **one-legged pose**
